data.actual_result: It gets cut if you don't move it a small amount (when opening ) (after moving it up: )
data.expected_result: It should be the normal size even if you don't move it
data.short_description: On mobile discord android go to setting and go to connections and then press add... The connect youre accounts get cut if you don't move it again.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - Connections - Add - Look at the Connect youre account message being cut a small amount if you don't love it
